pin.name: SyntaxHighlighting
pin.textcontent: Using a RichTextBox, all keywords within 800 characters of the cursor will be highlighted (cooldown of about 0.04 seconds). Cut off words will be trimmed and the selected part of the document will be read letter by letter and compared against keywords, which will be appended to the document accordingly.

pin.name: AutoComplete
pin.textcontent: Uses the previously typed word behind the user cursor/caret. A UI will appear under the cursor when 1 or more similar words are detected. What the user types is compared against all possible keywords and identifiers.

pin.name: Topbar-FileMenu
pin.textcontent: Gives the user access to commands specific to the open file. i.e, copy/paste/cut, save settings (autosave settings and such), etc
